1. A House of Dynamite review: 'Riveting' US nuclear attack thriller is 'more terrifying than most horror films'  BBC
  2. A House of Dynamite review – Kathryn Bigelow’s nuclear endgame thriller is a terrifying, white-knuckle comeback  The Guardian
  3. Kathryn Bigelow’s D.C. nuclear war thriller has electrified Venice  The Washington Post
  4. ‘A House Of Dynamite’ Review: Kathryn Bigelow’s Urgent Warning For Mankind Is So Plausible It Just May Scare You To Death – Venice Film Festival  Deadline
  5. At Venice, ‘A House of Dynamite’ Is Scarier Than Most Horror Films  The New York Times

item.title: Trump says he's ended 6 or 7 wars. Here's what the record shows. - CBS News
item.description:
